title: Bespoke basement flowers to fine dining forks in hours
text:
Bespoke basement flowers to fine dining forks in hours 3:38pm EST - 01:49 
Manhattan's largest vertical farm, Farm.One, grows edible flowers, herbs and microgreens in an office building basement for high-end restaurants. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
